survey_name: What is your prior knowledge on the topic of solar energy?

survey_questions.question: 1. What is the scientific definition of energy?
options: The property of a system to transfer capacity.
The capacity of a system to perform work.
The property of a system to store work capacity.
The work a system performs.
I don't know / I am not sure.

survey_questions.question: 2. What is the unit of energy?
options: Pascal
Watt
Joule
Volt
I don't know / I am not sure.

survey_questions.question: 3. The water in a reservoir behind a hydropower dam is an example of ...
options: kinetic energy.
potential energy.
electrical energy.
gravitational energy.
I don't know / I am not sure.

survey_questions.question: 4. Photovoltaics is the ...
options: conversion of light into electricity using semiconducting materials.
conversion of photonic energy into electrical energy using semiconducting materials.
transport of electrical energy from a single solar cell to the electricity grid.
transport of electrical energy between solar cell layers.
I don't know / I am not sure.
